summary: This mod changes the meshes and textures for the default gold coin and replaces it with the Rupee from the Legend of Zelda series.
descriptionHtml:
~Rupee Coins V1.0

~This mod changes the meshes and textures for the default gold coin and replaces it with the Rupee from the Legend of Zelda series.

~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary. 
3. Copy files to (install folder) your Skyrim Data folder. 
4. Start Skyrim Launcher and play.

~Uninstallation 
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s). 
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod: 

a. All of the files that came with the mod.

~Incompatibility 
a. Any mod that changes the texture or mesh of gold coins.

If any more are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Known Issues or Bugs 
None. If any more are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Change Log
1.0 Original Release

~Future plans
a. Make an .ESP file that makes groups of coins appear as different color rupees.

~Credits
a. Thanks to Nintendo for creating the amazing Legend of Zelda games.

~Notes
a. While the models and textures in this mod are very similar to the models from the Legend of Zelda games, they are not copies. I created these models and textures myself and it took much time. While I appreciate Nintendo\'s creation of the game, I am the sole creator of these models and textures.

~LoganZezima
author: LoganZezima
